function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Initial approach towards social distancing and self-isolation may not have been sufficient to prevent a high death count","Impact":"Increased death count due to ineffective measures","Mitigation":"Implement stricter social distancing and isolation measures, and use technology for contact tracing and monitoring","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"General population, especially the elderly and vulnerable","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High number of overseas arrivals during lockdown may have contributed to the spread of the virus","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 due to importation of cases from overseas","Mitigation":"Enforce strict quarantine measures for inbound travelers and implement testing and screening at entry points","Technologies":"Testing and screening technology, quarantine monitoring systems","People":"Travelers arriving in the UK, public health authorities","Owner":"Customs and border control, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to increased transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Higher infection rates and potential resurgence of the virus","Mitigation":"Continue reinforcing the importance of social distancing, use technology for contact tracing, and maintain surveillance of infection rates","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance systems, testing and screening technology","People":"General population, businesses, public health authorities","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"}]}
